comments.body: thank you to everyone in this sub, really helpful

Firstly, PES does not take admissions via ComedK. Only KCET and PESSAT. PESSAT is also easier than JEE Main, so don't use that score to assess any future scores. Focus on your prep for whatever time you have left.

some I've talked to say it's jee level, some say it's about kcet level and some say it's between kcet and comedk so a bit confused

some even said above jee m level

Lmao above JEE level huh. No scene man. I wrote PESSAT 5 years ago and unless things have changed, it should be around KCET/ComedK level. It might have *slightly* increased, but there is no way it's above JEE level.
got it thanks brother, people on quora and some people on this sub said it's jee level or above
If it helps you, I got 84 percentile in JEE and still got CSE (RR Campus) via PESSAT, so it's definitely possible
that's reassuring, thanks. any tips for the exam?

Yeah lmao. 

Even I got just 90 percentile for Mains and got CSE
Nah, for sure below jee
any tips for the exam?
You wanna keep an eye on the timeâ€¦I had to rush through 20 or so qns cuz I ran out of time. Basic CET prep should cover portions for PCM

If you had to ask me, I'll say focus strongly on the physics and Maths part. Chemistry would be somewhat easy compared to these 2. Oh and if your grammar and stuff is good, you need not worry about English either
considering 70 marks is enough for cs and my chemistry is strong seems like i just need either strong phy or maths right?
Yep
PESSAT is similar to BITSAT. I preped from BITSAT papers last minute and it sorta helped me.
thanks I'm prepping for bitsat only now, hoping that helps me

Exam pattern could feel weird but is easy
Almost that of KCET 
Concentrate more on organic chemistry
Physics could be ur scoring sub,try maximizing score there...U vl have a virtual calculator so use it propeerrlllyyy for calculations...In few questions as far as I remember the questions had a big calculation at the last step but calculator ofc made it ezzeee.
I had 3 fill in the blanks questions....Like :
The electric field lines thru a spherical conductor is _________ to the surface :- answers accepted were perpendicular or normal and so on


English part is pretty chill

really helpful thanks, so general consensus is to maximize marks in phy and chem and that would be enough for cs

questions are majorly from 12th?
Please tell me how is the pes university ring road campus
ummm as far as I remember the split was approx 70:30 btw 12th and 11th
